mapper.select: SELECT M_NO, M_ID, M_NAME, M_ADDRESS, M_TEL, M_GRADE FROM GALLERY."MEMBER" ORDER BY M_NO DESC
SELECT M_NO, M_ID, M_NAME, M_ADDRESS, M_TEL, M_GRADE FROM GALLERY."MEMBER" WHERE M_GRADE IN(4,5,7,8,9) ORDER BY M_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY."MEMBER" (M_NO, M_ID, M_NAME, M_ADDRESS, M_TEL, M_GRADE) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_id},#{m_name},#{m_address},#{m_tel},#{m_grade})
mapper.update: UPDATE GALLERY."MEMBER" SET M_GRADE= CASE WHEN M_GRADE='0' THEN '0' WHEN M_GRADE='1' THEN '1' WHEN M_GRADE='2' THEN '2' WHEN M_GRADE='3' THEN '3' WHEN M_GRADE='4' THEN '2' WHEN M_GRADE='5' THEN '3' WHEN M_GRADE='6' THEN '6' WHEN M_GRADE='7' THEN '6' WHEN M_GRADE='8' THEN '6' WHEN M_GRADE='9' THEN '6' ELSE 'DEFAULT' END WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
